meanings.definition: The state or quality of being mellow.
meanings.sent1: The mellownesses of the evening sun made everything glow warmly.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the mellownesses of a lazy Sunday afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The cat's mellownesses were evident as it stretched out in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had the mellownesses of a smooth jazz melody.
meanings.sent5: The mellownesses of the old oak tree provided a sense of calm in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The mellownesses of his demeanor were a stark contrast to his usual energy.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the mellownesses that came after a good yoga session.
meanings.sent3: The cake's delicious mellownesses were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The mellownesses of time passing were evident in the worn-out book.
meanings.sent5: His laughter had the mellownesses of genuine happiness.
